ch0158_10_carnet/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. So very nice to
see you.
ch0158_10_carnet/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope the time I spend with you will always
shine.
ch0158_10_carnet/7101_0701_01_10: This sygna suit was designed to match Diancie.
ch0158_10_carnet/7101_0701_03_10:
I feel like I could stand on any stage
with confidence.
ch0158_10_carnet/7102_0701_01_10:
They say Diancie’s shine is the most beautiful in
the world.
ch0158_10_carnet/7102_0701_02_10: When I look at it up close, I can understand why.
ch0158_10_carnet/7102_0701_03_10:
Am I able to shine as bright as Diancie without
falling behind?
ch0158_10_carnet/7102_0701_04_10:
I always ask myself that question and strive to
remain polished as a Trainer.
ch0158_10_carnet/7103_0701_01_10:
The feel of the characters I play can change
completely depending on what outfit I’m wearing.
ch0158_10_carnet/7103_0701_02_10:
If I were to act while wearing this outfit, I imagine
I’d be playing a classy lady.
ch0158_10_carnet/7104_0701_01_10:
When fans start to cheer for me, Diancie starts
showing off, as if competing with me.
ch0158_10_carnet/7104_0701_02_10: Perhaps it feels some intense rivalry towards me.
ch0158_10_carnet/7105_0701_01_10:
You don’t really notice what you look like if you’re
not conscious of it...
ch0158_10_carnet/7105_0701_02_10:
What I mean is, it depends on whether you’re
thinking about how other people see you.
ch0158_10_carnet/7105_0701_03_10:
Do you ever battle while considering how someone
might view you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0158_10_carnet/1701_0701_01_10: I have a present for you. Please enjoy this.
ch0158_10_carnet/1701_0702_02_10:
I gave it to you because I thought it would bring
some color to your daily life.
ch0158_10_carnet/2501_0701_01_10:
There are times when precious gems, clothes, and
jewelry choose people.
ch0158_10_carnet/2501_0701_02_10:
No matter how beautiful your possessions are, if
you don’t have a heart worthy of them, they’ll
look dull.
ch0158_10_carnet/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s important to keep working on yourself so that
you are just as beautiful as what you’re wearing.
ch0158_10_carnet/2501_0702_02_10:
Do it so you can be noble and beautiful...so you
can be proud of yourself.
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0701_01_10:
Diancie can Mega Evolve when it responds to
my feelings.
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0701_02_10:
It takes on an appearance that’s completely
different from before...
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0701_03_10:
That doesn’t only happen to Pokémon. It applies to
people, too.
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0701_04_10:
Anyone can reinvent themselves, as long as they
want to change.
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0702_01_10: I’m also used to changing my appearance.
ch0158_10_carnet/2511_0702_02_10:
I have range. I could play anything from a young
girl to an old lady. *chuckle*
ch0158_10_carnet/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Your smile has just as much sparkle
as the sunrise!
ch0158_10_carnet/3003_0701_01_10:
When I’m tired, I try to stop and take in my
surroundings. I often find that my outlook
has changed.
ch0158_10_carnet/3005_0701_01_10:
Just by standing in the moonlight, anyone can look
like an elegant actor... *chuckle*
